H0.text: The Big Bang Theory is an event or principle that cannot have its validity directly tested by laboratory experiment.

H1.text: The Conservation of Energy cannot have its validity directly tested by laboratory experiment.

H2.text: The periodicity of element properties cannot have its validity directly tested by laboratory experiment.

H3.text: The Acceleration of Objects due to Gravity cannot have its validity directly tested by laboratory experiment.

A4.text: Precise modern models of the Big Bang appeal to various exotic physical phenomena that have not been observed in terrestrial laboratory experiments.

A5.text: Indirect evidence for dark matter comes from its gravitational influence on other matter, as no dark matter particles have been observed in laboratories.
